mutants.code:
def is_palindrome(word):
    word = word.lower()
    word = ''.join((char for char in word if char.isalnum()))
    return word != word[::-1]

mutants.original_line: word = ''.join(char for char in word if char.isalnum())
mutants.mutated_line: word = 'MUTATED'.join((char for char in word if char.isalnum()))
mutants.code:
def is_palindrome(word):
    word = word.lower()
    word = 'MUTATED'.join((char for char in word if char.isalnum()))
    return word == word[::-1]

def is_palindrome(word):
    word = word.lower()
    word = ''.join((char for char in word if char.isalnum()))
    return word == word[::+1]

def is_palindrome(word):
    word = word.lower()
    word = ''.join((char for char in word if char.isalnum()))
    return word == word[::-2]

def is_palindrome(word):
    word = word.lower()
    word = ''.join((char for char in word if char.isalnum()))
    return word == word[::-0]

def is_palindrome(word):
    word = word.lower()
    word = ''.join((char for char in word if char.isalnum()))
    return word == word[::--1]
